mapper.select: with recursive etc as (select menu_no , upper_menu_no , menu_code , menu_name , 0 depth , concat(menu_no) AS NO_PATH , concat(menu_code) AS ROUTE_PATH from tbl_menu where upper_menu_no IS NULL union all select m.menu_no , m.upper_menu_no , m.menu_code , m.menu_name , depth + 1 , concat(NO_PATH, '->', m.menu_no) AS NO_PATH , concat(ROUTE_PATH, '/', m.menu_code) AS ROUTE_PATH from etc e join tbl_menu m on e.menu_no = m.upper_menu_no) select * from etc # FIXME : MENU_ORDER
SELECT * FROM tbl_menu WHERE upper_menu_no IS NULL

select distinct m.menu_code from (WITH RECURSIVE findMainOrga AS (select tbl_orga.orga_no, tbl_orga.upper_orga_no, tbl_orga.orga_type from tbl_orga inner join tbl_emp_mapping eM on tbl_orga.orga_no = eM.orga_no inner join tbl_emp e on eM.emp_no = e.emp_no join tbl_dept_mapping d on tbl_orga.upper_orga_no = d.orga_no where username = #{username} # and d.dept_main = true UNION ALL select o.orga_no, o.upper_orga_no, o.orga_type from findMainOrga f inner join tbl_orga o on f.upper_orga_no = o.orga_no) select f.orga_no, f.orga_type from findMainOrga f) as f inner join tbl_orga_role o on o.orga_no = f.orga_no inner join tbl_role_group rg on o.role_group_no = rg.role_group_no join tbl_menu_role mr on rg.role_group_no = mr.role_group_no join tbl_menu m on mr.menu_no = m.menu_no order by f.orga_type

with recursive etc as (select menu_no , upper_menu_no , menu_code , menu_name , 0 depth , concat(menu_no) AS NO_PATH , concat(menu_code) AS ROUTE_PATH from tbl_menu where menu_code = #{menuCode} union all select m.menu_no , m.upper_menu_no , m.menu_code , m.menu_name , depth + 1 , concat(NO_PATH, '->', m.menu_no) AS NO_PATH , concat(ROUTE_PATH, '/', m.menu_code) AS ROUTE_PATH from etc e join tbl_menu m on e.menu_no = m.upper_menu_no) select * from etc
